channel.title: Game AI on ssamot's heretical rumblings
channel.description: Recent content in Game AI on ssamot's heretical rumblings

item.title: Openspiel
item.description: I make use of the common data science frameworks for my everyday work (sklearn, pandas, tensorflow, seaborn and the like). For game-specific stuff I find Openspiel indispensable. It does everything in a very nice API – from standard RL methods to LP solvers for normal form games to integration with a ton of languages.
